title: The Washington Star

renewed-contributions.title: Tarzan
renewed-contributions.note: Text by Burroughs and Garden, pictures by Hogarth, created as work for hire for Edgar Rice Burroughs, Inc., which is the author for copyright purposes.

additional-note: While the CCE renewal record for one specific Tarzan comic strip specifically mentions the Washington Star, other Tarzan strips, as well as some other nationally syndicated comic strips that ran in the Star, would have active renewals as well.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Shelton Henderson for copyright research on this title.
